body_html:
I don't think it looks like a hack.
I think that the use-cases where you want to handle batch-loading in the dataset are limited, and you'd need to write all the parallelisation logic yourself, which means you wouldn't benefit from most of the goodies from the DataLoader

body:
I don't think it looks like a hack.
I think that the use-cases where you want to handle batch-loading in the dataset are limited, and you'd need to write all the parallelisation logic yourself, which means you wouldn't benefit from most of the goodies from the DataLoader
